outcome: Military Pragmatists establish martial law, intensifying unrest and curfew enforcement.

events.description: Military Pragmatists lobby successfully for an increased presence within urban areas.
Authorities announce a temporary martial law, justifying curfews as a preventive measure.
Residents report multiple incidents of overreach by security forces, leading to viral outrage.
Military Pragmatists' control loosens as public protests swell, demanding the end of martial law.
